*SOLD* R Bass Custom 6 W/Buckeye Burl Top!
Wow, Ray is doing things over the top theses days. This bass is one month old & looks like it just came out of the shop, not one ding. This on has a Super nice Buckeye Burl Top, Mahogany Body W/Figured Mahogany where the neck goes thru on the back & wood control cover, 5 piece neck with a Sweet 24 fret Macassar Ebony board & action that is Super Low. Bart 3 band EQ w/active/passive modes, & a mid selector switch. Nuckthru design & some real cool touches like Wood pickup covers, 2 tone wood knobs, Gold Hardware & incredible attention to detail. If I was a 6 string player you would NOT BE SEEING THIS!
